Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time playing video games. I love playing competitive games when I'm playing with friends and at the same time we get to bond.

When I am not playing video games, I spend my time researching on new things especially about technology. I also love to watch videos on YouTube about different myths and documentaries. It triggers the curiosity of my mind and I research about that topic more after watching the video.
